title: Day or Night?
details: Preferably Night, much more expensive but I think better overall so it isn't hot af. Open to discussion.

title: Cottage
details: I'm planning to get the 2nd cheapest (Casitas) that can house 12 people, extra person have additional Php 50. Not really big if ever we're around 15 people. Open to discussion.

title: Food
details: This needs more planning. No plans yet if ever we we're to pick this option for swimming.

title: Other Notes
details: Better to have discussion on where are we planning to go first since this is the second option. If the first option (Batangas) isn't viable, I'll add more details here.
